# 1.Gi·ªõi thi·ªáu

üí° OOP L√Ä G√å ?

L·∫≠p tr√¨nh th·ªß t·ª•cL·∫≠p tr√¨nh h∆∞·ªõng ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng
vi·∫øt th·ªß t·ª•c¬†ho·∫∑c methods¬†th·ª±c hi·ªán thao t√°c tr√™n d·ªØ li·ªáuT·∫°o c√°i Object¬†ch·ª©a c·∫£¬†data¬†v√† Methods
OOP vs Procedural

L·∫≠p tr√¨nh h∆∞·ªõng ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng ∆∞u ƒëi·ªÉm h∆°n l·∫≠p tr√¨nh th·ªß t·ª•c :

# 2.Classes v√† Objects

M·ªçi th·ª© trong Java ƒë·ªÅu li√™n k·∫øt v·ªõi Classes (l·ªõp) v√† Objects (ƒë·ªëi t∆∞·ª£ng), c√πng v·ªõi attributes (thu·ªôc t√≠nh) v√† methods (ph∆∞∆°ng th·ª©c).

‚ö†Ô∏è L∆ØU √ù

B·∫°n ch·ªâ c·∫ßn ch√∫ √Ω Class v√† Objects th√¥i nh√©.

  • Trong class h·ªçc sinh, c√≥ Object l√† nh·ªØng b·∫°n A, b·∫°n B, b·∫°n C...

üí° V√ç D·ª§ TH√äM

# 3.Attributes

Nh∆∞ h√¨nh ·∫£nh ·ªü tr√™n, c√≥ th·ªÉ th·∫ø th·∫•y ƒë∆∞·ª£c Attribute l√† nh·ªØng ƒë·∫∑c t√≠nh nh·∫≠n d·∫°ng c·ªßa m·ªôt Class.

V√≠ d·ª• c·ª• th·ªÉ

  • Object l√† h·ªçc sinh ‚á® Atrributes l√† tu·ªïi,t√™n,gi·ªõi t√≠nh...

  • Object l√† tr√°i c√¢y ‚á® Attributes l√† m√†u s·∫Øc,l√°,h·∫°t...

  • Object l√† ƒë·ªông v·∫≠t ‚á® Attributes l√† m√†u l√¥ng,ƒëu√¥i,tay,ch√¢n.

üí° Gi·ªëng nh∆∞ b√†i tr√™n th√¨ bi·∫øn x l√† m·ªôt Attribute trong class Main

C√°ch s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Attribute

S·ª≠ d·ª•ng d·∫•u . tr∆∞·ªõc Object ƒë·ªÉ truy c·∫≠p t·ªõi c√°c Attributes c·ªßa n√≥ :

  • V√≠ d·ª• tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng : ƒê·ªôngv·∫≠t.m√†ul√¥ng, Tr√°ic√¢y.m√†u, H·ªçcSinh.tu·ªïi...

  • V√≠ d·ª• c·ª• th·ªÉ : Array.length....

  • V√≠ d·ª• th·ª±c t·∫ø : T·∫°o file Demo.java nh∆∞ sau

    final int age = 3;
    String name = "Lucky";
    String color = "red";
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Demo myObj = new Demo();
        System.out.println("age = " + myObj.age);
        System.out.println("name : " + myObj.name);
        System.out.println("color : " + myObj.color);
    }
}
/* age = 3
   name = Lucky
   color = red
*/

# 4.Methods

Nh∆∞ h√¨nh ·∫£nh ·ªü tr√™n, Methods l√† nh·ªØng h√†nh vi, ch·ª©c nƒÉng c·ªßa m·ªôt Attribute

V√≠ d·ª• c·ª• th·ªÉ

  • Object : con ng∆∞·ªùi ‚á® Atrributes : tay... ‚á® Methods : n·∫Øm,b√≥p,s·ªù,ƒë·∫•m...

  • Object : ƒë·ªông v·∫≠t ‚á® Attributes : tay,ch√¢n... ‚á® Methods : ƒëi,ch·∫°y...

üí° Ta ƒë√£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c h·ªçc v·ªÅ vi·ªác t·∫°o Methods ·ªü B√†i Java Methods

C√°ch s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Methods

C≈©ng gi·ªëng nh∆∞ Attributes, b·∫°n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng d·∫•u . tr∆∞·ªõc Object ƒë·ªÉ g·ªçi Methods c·ªßa n√≥.

‚ö†Ô∏è Methods l√† h√†m n√™n s·∫Ω c√≥ d·∫•u ()

  • V√≠ d·ª• tr·ª´u t∆∞·ª£ng : ƒê·ªôngv·∫≠t.ch·∫°y(), H·ªçcSinh.ƒëi(),H·ªçcSinh.y√™u()...

  • V√≠ d·ª• c·ª• th·ªÉ: Math.pow(x,y), String.toString()...

  • V√≠ d·ª• th·ª±c t·∫ø: T·∫°o m·ªôt file Cat.java nh∆∞ sau:

        System.out.println("Con m√®o ƒë√£ ch·∫°y");
    }

        System.out.println("Con m√®o ƒëang ƒÉn");

        Cat conMeo = new Demo(); // t·∫°o Object conMeo
        conMeo.run(); //g·ªçi method run
        conMeo.eat(); //g·ªçi methos eat
    }

# 5.Constructors

üí° CONSTRUCTOR L√Ä G√å ?

Constructors l√† m·ªôt methods ƒë·∫∑c bi·ªát d√πng ƒë·ªÉ kh·ªüi t·∫°o c√°c Objects.

  • ƒê∆∞·ª£c g·ªçi khi m·ªôt Object c·ªßa Class ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫°o
  • S·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë·ªÉ ƒë·∫∑t c√°c gi√° tr·ªã ban ƒë·∫ßu cho c√°c Attributes

‚ö†Ô∏è L∆ØU √ù

  • T√™n Contructors ph·∫£i gi·ªëng v·ªõi t√™n class v√† kh√¥ng c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã tr·∫£ v·ªÅ (k·ªÉ c·∫£ void)

  • üî• T·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c Class trong Java ƒë·ªÅu c√≥ constructor, n·∫øu b·∫°n kh√¥ng t·∫°o, Java s·∫Ω l√†m vi·ªác ƒë√≥ thay cho b·∫°n ‚á® n·∫øu v·∫≠y th√¨ b·∫°n s·∫Ω kh√¥ng th·ªÉ ƒë·∫∑t value v√† attributes ban ƒë·∫ßu cho n√≥ ƒë∆∞·ª£c.

public class Demo{
    int x;
    public Demo(){ // gi·ªëng v·ªõi t√™n class v√† kh√¥ng c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã tr·∫£ v·ªÅ
        x = 5;
    }
    public static void main(String[] args){
        Demo myObj = new Demo();
        System.out.println(myObj.x);
    }
}
// output : 5

Constructor c≈©ng c√≥ th·ªÉ nh·∫≠n c√°c tham s·ªë ƒë·ªÉ kh·ªüi t·∫°o thu·ªôc t√≠nh :

Constructor c√≥ th·ªÉ nh·∫≠n tham s·ªë kh·ªüi t·∫°o thu·ªôc t√≠nh

    int ageCat;
    String nameCat;

    public Demo(int age, String name){
        ageCat = age;
        nameCat = name;
    }
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Demo myCat = new Demo(3,"M√©o Meo"); //khai b√°o constructor
        System.out.println("m√®o t√™n " + myCat.nameCat);
        System.out.println("m√®o t√¥i " + myCat.ageCat + " tu·ªïi");

    }
}
/* m√®o t√™n M√©o Meo
   m√®o t√¥i 3 tu·ªïi */
